header.sub-second: We all want that your account is safe!
header.sub-third: Did you already see the fancy one?

info.title: What can you expect?
info.content:
Habbo game registreer en geniet van onze fantastische voordelen zoals gratis Habbo Credits, VIP-lidmaatschap of ons welkomstgeschenk. Allemaal helemaal gratis!



Je kunt Habbo gratis spelen en daarbij een oneindig universum van kamers, uitdagingen, chats verkennen en honderden gratis Habbo-credits verdienen. vul nu het hobbaregister in.

messages.alpha: The {field} field may only contain alphabetic characters
messages.alpha_num: The {field} field may only contain alpha-numeric characters
messages.alpha_dash: The {field} field may contain alpha-numeric characters as well as dashes and underscores
messages.alpha_spaces: The {field} field may only contain alphabetic characters as well as spaces
messages.between: The {field} field must be between 0:{min} and 1:{max}
messages.confirmed: The {field} field confirmation does not match
messages.digits: The {field} field must be numeric and exactly contain 0:{length} digits
messages.dimensions: The {field} field must be 0:{width} pixels by 1:{height} pixels
messages.email: The {field} field must be a valid email
messages.excluded: The {field} field is not a valid value
messages.ext: The {field} field is not a valid file
messages.image: The {field} field must be an image
messages.integer: The {field} field must be an integer
messages.max_value: The {field} field must be 0:{max} or less
messages.max: The {field} field may not be greater than 0:{length} characters
messages.mimes: The {field} field must have a valid file type
messages.min_value: The {field} field must be 0:{min} or more
messages.min: The {field} field must be at least 0:{length} characters
messages.numeric: The {field} field may only contain numeric characters
messages.one_of: The {field} field is not a valid value
messages.size: The {field} field size must be less than 0:{size}KB
